#summary An outline of the schema Simal uses
#labels Phase-Design

This document describes the Schema currently in use within Simal as well as outlining some proposals for future data requirements.

=Namespaces=

|| *Prefix* || *Name* || *URI* || *Notes* ||
|| asf || Apache Software Foundation || http://projects.apache.org/ns/asfext# || ||
|| dc || Dublin Core || http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/ || ||
|| doap || Description of a Project || http://usefulinc.com/ns/doap# || ||
|| foaf || Friend of a Friend || http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/ || ||
|| rdf || Resource Description Framework || http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns# || ||
|| rdfs || Resource Description Framework || http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema# ||  ||
|| simal || Simal || http://oss-watch.ac.uk/ns/0.2/simal# || ||

=Currently Supported=

|| *Name* || *Since* || *Description* || *Example* ||
||simal:Project||A simal representation of a project. This extends a doap:Project and allows some additional information to be provided.||0.3||<simal:Project rdf:about="http://foo.org/projectX">||
||doap:Project||A project.||0.2||<doap:Project rdf:about="http://foo.org/projectX#">...<doap:Project>||
||doap:name||A name of something.||0.2||<doap:name>Project X</doap:name>||
||doap:homepage||URL of a project's homepage, associated with exactly one project.||0.2||<doap:homepage rdf:resource="http://www.foo.org"/>||
||doap:old-homepage||URL of a project's past homepage, associated with exactly one project.||0.2||<doap:old-homepage rdf:resource="http://www.bar.org/foo"/>||
||doap:created||Date when something was created, in YYYY-MM-DD form. e.g. 2004-04-05||0.2||<doap:created>2004-04-05</doap:created>||
||doap:shortdesc||Short plain text description of a project.||0.2||<doap:shortdesc>A short description</doap:shortdesc>||
||doap:description||Plain text description of a project.||0.2||<doap:description>A complete description with all the words you could hope to see.</doap:description>||
||doap:release||A project release.||0.2||<doap:release rdf:about="http://foo.org/project/release/0.1>...</doap:release>||
||doap:mailing-list||Mailing list home page or email address.||0.2||||
||doap:category||A category of project.||0.2||||
||doap:license||The URI of an RDF description of the license outputs are distributed under.||0.2||||
||doap:repository||Data repository.||0.2||||
||doap:download-page||Web page from which the project outputs can be downloaded.||0.2||||
||doap:download-mirror||Mirror of download web page.||0.2||||
||doap:revision||Revision identifier of an output||0.2||||
||doap:wiki||URL of Wiki for collaborative discussion of project.||0.2||||
||doap:bug-database||issue tracker for a project.||0.2||||
||doap:screenshots||Web page with screenshots of project.||0.2||||
||doap:maintainer||Maintainer of a project, a project leader.||0.2||||
||developer||Developer of software for the project.||0.2||||
||documenter||Contributor of documentation to the project.||0.2||||
||doap:translator||Contributor of translations to the project.||0.2||||
||doap:tester||A tester or other quality control contributor.||0.2||||
||doap:helper||Project contributor.||0.2||||
||doap:programming-language||Programming language a project is implemented in or intended for use with.||0.2||||
||doap:os||Operating system that a project is limited to. Omit this property if the project is not OS-specific.||0.2||||
